expo.name: Parkvana

infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Parkvana needs your location to show nearby parking spots and help you navigate to your reservation.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: Parkvana needs your location to show nearby parking spots and help you navigate to your reservation.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Parkvana needs camera access to let you take photos of your parking space.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Parkvana needs photo library access to let you upload photos of your parking space.

plugins.locationAlwaysAndWhenInUsePermission: Allow Parkvana to use your location to find nearby parking spots.

expo.description: Find affordable parking or earn money from your unused parking space. Every booking helps feed a veteran.
